cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/platform/api/v1/users/{id} \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

401

404

Copy

```
This response does not have an example.
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/users/delete-a-user#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by the system admin after creating a platformApp. This token should be used to provision agent bots, accounts, users and their roles.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/users/delete-a-user#parameter-id)

id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the user on the platform

#### Response

200

200401404

Success
